FROM_ADDRESS.description: If not specified, this filter is ignored

TO_ADDRESS.description: If not specified, this filter is ignored

TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: If not specified, this filter is ignored

MIN_VALUE.description: Minimum transfer amount (ignored if not specified)

MAX_VALUE.description: Maximum transfer amount (ignored if not specified)

DECIMALS.description: Token decimals for auto-converting wei to human-readable format (Not specified = raw wei)
